So Sage, what gave you the inspiration for AI?
I've been a big fan of stories that take place in other worlds or inside of video games for a really long time- and Yosh! actually started on a .Hack//signs forum  back in ye old times

so I've always wanted to do a story like this and have been planning a lot of different stories and I finally came up with a group of characters and plot points that i liked and that worked well together
Yeah I always loved stories in other worlds myself.
Still have a lot of work to do on my own characters though haha
i still have a lot of stories i want to do - but so little time

Allo Kiwi, and I'm on Android XD
what do you mean new ios
oh no i didnt do that yet
what's special about it this time
last update they changed the quick menu look and I wasn’t too into it
so I’ve not been into constantly updating

wasnt the new iOS update for that breach?

the news about that was like "Hey, we made it so your phone cant be compromised by this thing! Oh but it probably already was and it included stuff like your password and account information- so if you did get hit by it you should change that"
"So how do I know if my data was compromised?" "Don't ask us- we aren't a help center!"
I’ve gotten help whenever I’ve talked to apple service
never asked about breach stuff or anything but when google couldn’t help, they have
yeah but they arent going to tell you if your account was compromised in this last attack
I’ll try asking my aunt when I get around her
any data collected hasnt been made public yet far as they know- but most likely you'll need to check on a site like haveibeenpwned
all apple seems to know is that millions of devices have been compromised
Oh wow, haven't heard of that data breath
years ago Apple had a guy message them about a flaw they found that could be used to upload malware onto their OS - their response to his warning was to ban his Apple Account
companies like Microsoft will pay you for that kinda information- they call em bounties for hunting down bugs or exploits and letting them know
Yeah. But it's Apple being Apple I suppose
i think his response was something like "The only thing about this that bothers me besides it being a bad practice, Is I had all my music through Apple and now I cant access it"
Yeah I haven't owned an Apple product since 2014
